name: Bee Gone (w2reach)
description:
Completed with full 3D Models and made in Unreal Engine 5, "Bee Gone" is a strategy survival game that tasks you with using 5 worker bees to defend your nest against incoming waves of enemies. Try and see if you can last all 5 minutes and defeat all the wasps!

Controls:

Click on a bee when the hex beneath it is full to select where to move it. When next to a Wasp, click on it to push it back instead, and hit it all the way off the edge to take it out!
